message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth discussing. My initial offer for this exceptional item is $10,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose we set the price at $9,500.
